text: Jesús Luis Ocaña Pernía (9 June 1945 – 19 May 1994) was a Spanish road bicycle racer. He won the 1973 Tour de France and the 1970 Vuelta a España. He was born in Priego, Cuenca, Spain. Ocaña died in Nogaro, France at the age of 48. ==Other websites== Category:Spanish cyclists Category:1945 births Category:1994 births
title: Luis Ocaña
